attributes.action: Ask the Met Police and others to continue to investigate the Leave campaign.
attributes.background: There has been talk of this being politically sensitive but the law must be upheld in a democracy. Please ask whether the law enforcement agencies consider there to have been evidence of law-breaking by the official Leave campaign, and whether an investigation is underway with a view to prosecution.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be an operational decision for the police and not something the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.
